label: % CO2 TR
title: PCO2TR '% CO2 saved by thermal recycling'

label: % CO2 BR
title: PCO2BR '% CO2 saved by bottle recycling'

label: % CO2 TP
title: PCO2TP '% CO2 saved by TPak recycling'

label: CO2 bottle recycle
title: BotCO2 'kt of CO2 from bottle recycling' = 3*(1-PCO2BR)*(PETRT+PERT)

label: Landfill CO2
title: LCO2 'kt of CO2 as a landfill penalty' = 3*Landfill

label: Total CO2
title: TCO2 'kt of CO2 in your scenario' = TRCO2+LCO2+BotCO2+TPCO2
